about_the_game:
Fuel your frenzy with one of the most intense soundtracks in the Armageddon Sector. Rock it out with heavy metal beats that echo your pursuit to take down the thieving Warboss!

The Warhammer 40,000: Shootas, Blood & Teef Official Soundtrack is composed by Deon van Heerden. All tracks are provided in MP3 and lossless FLAC format.
detailed_description:
Fuel your frenzy with one of the most intense soundtracks in the Armageddon Sector. Rock it out with heavy metal beats that echo your pursuit to take down the thieving Warboss!

The Warhammer 40,000: Shootas, Blood & Teef Official Soundtrack is composed by Deon van Heerden. All tracks are provided in MP3 and lossless FLAC format.

short_description: Original Soundtrack of Warhammer 40,000: Shootas, Blood & Teef containing over one hour of intense music. Available in both mp3 and FLAC formats.
